author: perama
content:
I was playing around and found that some miners seem to be placing value on some type 0x2 lowered than expected. 

Perhaps related to situations where the max fee and priority fee are set the same

Might be harmful for uptake if your type 0x2 transactions are more sluggish than legacy.

More here: https://twitter.com/eth_worm/status/1425104390671814666?s=19
